value.name: Cheshire drug dealer caught concealing heroin and crack 'in his buttocks'
value.description: A drug dealer has been jailed after it was discovered during a county lines crackdown that he concealed a large quantity of class A drugs 'in his buttocks'. Christopher Pope, 38, transported heroin and crack-cocaine from Liverpool into Northwich and Winsford.

value.name: Suspect identified in Carson City Wells Fargo bank robbery
value.description: On Tuesday, May 18, 2021 at about 4:18 p.m. the Carson City Sheriff’s Office responded to the Wells Fargo Bank located at 1550 East William Street for a reported bank robbery that had just occurred. According to witnesses the suspect approached the bank teller and demanded money.

value.name: County Lines dealer with drugs hidden in buttocks is jailed
value.description: A DEALER who was rumbled after police found drugs stashed between his buttocks has been jailed. Christopher Pope was responsible for bringing class A drugs from Liverpool into Northwich and Winsford.
